thread.title_full: Ground News - SBW says Manu’s million-dollar rugby bid can make him an even bigger NRL asset

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - SBW says Manu’s million-dollar rugby bid can make him an even bigger NRL asset
text:
Summary by Ground News Sonny Bill Williams returned to the NRL in 2013 and finished the year with a premiership. The Roosters have several moving pieces in their salary cap in the coming years. Dragons five-eighth Talatau Amone has formally accepted his NRL deregistration for his role in a rooftop hammer attack on a tradie in Wollongong. Share menu More
Filters 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
Sydney Morning Herald Lean Left High Factuality Media Conglomerate: Nine Entertainment Co. SBW says Manu’s million-dollar rugby bid can make him an even bigger NRL asset Sonny Bill Williams is one of few NRL players to tread the path Joey Manu is eyeing in Japan. Not only is he applauding the prospective move, Williams can see the NRL benefitting.
4 hours ago · Sydney, Australia Read Full Article
